mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_num, p.prod_name, p.prod_sellcnt, t.topcate_num, d.dcate_num, d.dcate_name, p.prod_price, p.prod_discntrate, p.prod_image3, p.prod_stock FROM unomasdb.products p INNER JOIN unomasdb.detail_category d ON p.prod_category = d.dcate_num INNER JOIN unomasdb.top_category t ON d.topcate_num = t.topcate_num WHERE d.dcate_num = 11 ORDER BY prod_readcnt is null asc, prod_readcnt desc limit 4
